Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two students with a general attempt to connect them with a line, indicating a potential string.
The student can depict students holding something (which might not clearly be interpreted as cups or the parts of a string telephone).
CANNOT: The student cannot clearly show how the string telephone functions (e.g., the line might be inconsistent or not attached to cups).
The drawing is unlikely to depict sound traveling along the string (student doesn't know this).
The student cannot effectively show how this device helps communicate over a distance (student may lack understanding of distance impacts).
The student might not demonstrate or label the proper use of materials (e.g., cups or tightness of string is not shown).
